pr_title: Link directly to Presto connector  doc

timeline.message:
Link directly to Presto connector  doc

At @blue's suggestion, this PR changes stie/mkdocs.yml to link directly
to the Presto connector documentation.  On @electrum's advice,  it leaves
docs/presto.md in place, in case folks link to it directly.

timeline.bodyText: Now there are no links to "presto.md". We probably should remove it
timeline.author: RussellSpitzer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ nav:
     - Flink: flink.md
     - Spark: spark.md
     - Spark Streaming: spark-structured-streaming.md
-    - Presto: presto.md
+    - Presto: https://prestosql.io/docs/current/connector/iceberg.html

replies.bodyText: Oh I see we are leaving it in place for past links? Perhaps we should change it to a redirect
replies.author: RussellSpitzer
